name: Cotton Baby Costumes: Baby Girl Vampire Costume Size 6-12 months SOLD OUT!
description:
Cotton Baby Costumes: Baby Girl Vampire (Vampira) Costume Size 6-12 months.
 
VAMPIRA includes 2 pcs: Black vampira dress with long sleeves, red trim with faux "spider necklace", Black Vampire Cape with openings for arms.
 
For cold weather you may wish to add your own tights or pants or booties (shown but Not included). 

SIZE: 6-12 MONTHS (fits most babies who wear 6-12 months sized clothing)

FABRIC: 100% COTTON: Machine Wash Cold, Tumble Dry Gentle. Allow for some shrinkage.

NOTE: This is a ONE OF A KIND size on this cotton baby girl vampire costume. It is a special prototype/sample that we had made up for us. No other 6-12 month sizes exist! It is labeled as a prototype. Truly unique!

Regular Boutique Value: $25 {On Sale now}

This is our own in-house brand: Harrisons Halloween Cotton Baby Costumes. Designed in Santa Barbara CA by a first-time mom. (Imported manufacturing)

For Concerned Parents - Our Harrisons Halloween 100% Cotton Baby Costumes are one of the few Non-petroleum-based cotton fabrics on the market today. 

Use CAUTION with all costumes. This cotton costume has Not been coated with flame retardant chemicals. Do not come in contact with Halloween pumpkin candles, and other open flames.

Though our Harrisons Halloween infant costumes are not organic, they are 100 percent cotton, and as a natural fabric, they are a great alternative to toxic pvc and dangerous synthetic petroleum-based baby costumes.

AVAILABILITY: 1 in stock (last one).

© CastlesNcrowns, Harrisons Halloween Cotton Baby Costumes, and ི♥ྀ Tricia The Fairy Godmother ི♥ྀ 2005-present.

name: Cotton Baby Frankenstein Costume Frankenbaby Halloween Costume Size 6-12 Months SOLD OUT!
description:
Baby Frankenstein Cotton Halloween Costume: FRANKENBABY - Everyone loves this cute green and black headpiece with velcro chin strap. ONE SIZE: 6-12 MONTHS.

Includes: Pants, long sleeve top with attached green vest, black booties.

This is a ONE OF A KIND size on this cotton baby Frankenstein costume. It is a special prototype/sample that we had made up for us. No other 6-12 month sizes exist! It is labeled as a prototype.*

SIZE: fits most babies/toddlers who wear 6-12 months clothing sizes.

(Note: Frankenbaby is so popular we are sold out of the smaller 0-6 month size!)

ON SALE. Last/only one in stock. Final Sale. No returns. Clearance Sample-Sale. Original Retail Boutique Price: $25 each.

*SPECIAL NOTE: Mislabeled: When you receive this costume it will have a sewn-in label that reads 0-6 months, which is the only size we had made previously, and therefore the only label size in stock. However, our manufacturing company sent us THIS ONE AND ONLY PROTOTYPE/SAMPLE of a LARGER 6-12 MONTHS SIZE, and for display purposes sewed our regular label into it. The label is wrong, but the size is right (infant 6-12 months).

This is our own in-house brand: Harrisons Halloween Cotton Baby Costumes. Designed in Santa Barbara CA by a first-time mom. (Imported manufacturing)

For Concerned Parents - Our Harrisons Halloween 100% Cotton Baby Costumes are one of the few Non-petroleum-based cotton fabrics on the market today. 

Use CAUTION with all costumes. This cotton costume has Not been coated with flame retardant chemicals. Do not come in contact with Halloween pumpkin candles, and other open flames.

Though our Harrisons Halloween infant costumes are not organic, they are 100 percent cotton, and as a natural fabric, they are a great alternative to toxic pvc and dangerous synthetic petroleum-based baby costumes.

AVAILABILITY: 1 in stock (last one).

For Concerned Parents - Our Harrisons Halloween 100% Cotton Baby Costumes are one of the few Non-petroleum-based cotton fabrics on the market today.

Though our Harrisons Halloween infant costumes are not organic, they are 100 percent cotton, and as a natural fabric, they are a great alternative to toxic pvc and dangerous synthetic petroleum-based baby costumes.

WITCHIE includes 3 pieces: Black Dress with long sleeves and Orange Cat design, Orange and Black (non-stretch) cotton Booties), Black cotton felt Witch Hat with unique shape, and tie at neck. For cold weather, you may wish to add your own tights or pants.

SIZE: 0-6 MONTHS SIZE (fits most babies who wear 3-6 months clothing size, not age). Hat Size: Approx. 16" circumference (around inside).

name: Baby-Toddler Orange and Black Striped Socks for Halloween
description:
Orange and Black STRIPED SOCKS: These adorable baby-toddler size orange and black striped socks are perfect for Halloween outfits or witch costumes, or for making mini sock monkeys, sock zebras, sock monsters or other sock animals.

Color: Burnt Orange and Black. (Please remember that colors may vary due to your own viewing screen/settings).

Style: Stripes. 
Size: 0-12 or even stretches to 18-24 months. 
Fabric: Stretchy poly-blend. {NOT COTTON}
Price: Boutique price: $8.99 pair. ON SALE now.

HALLOWEEN SOCKS: These fun striped socks go great with my COTTON Baby Witch Hat/Halloween Hat and Baby Witch Dress / Costumes.

Designer: Harrisons Halloween Costumes (my own brand). 
Imported. 

Fashion socks for autumn / fall, Halloween socks, and for adding to your own Halloween costume.

Sale items are All Sales Final, Clearance, No returns or refunds.
~Thank you

CAUTION: This item and all our costumes have Not been coated with flame-retardant chemicals. Keep this an all costumes away from pumpkin candles and open flames.

AVAILABILITY: 3 in stock.
